subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The No. 18 and No. 20 Joe Gibbs Racing teams in the Nationwide Series will probably face big penalties after apparent efforts to alter the results of a chassis test. Nascar inspectors found magnets under the cars’ gas pedals.
snippet: The No. 18 and No. 20 Joe Gibbs Racing teams in the Nationwide Series will probably face big penalties after apparent efforts to alter the results of a chassis test. Nascar inspectors found magnets under the cars’ gas pedals.
